Talk67:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>We call the broken rings up ahead the
<clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>. They're remnants of the
ancient Zonai civilization.
These ruins fell from the sky. Inside, we
found stone slabs carved with writing.
Talk32: <sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Ease_01>Look here. See? That's a stone slab.
Talk68:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>What is it?


I need to wrap up my report on the
<clr:0000>strange artifacts filled with Zonai devices<clr:ffff>.
No time for idle chatter.
Talk33:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The text on the slab is from the Zonai
civilization, so it's beyond me.<sp:0:4:0>But our leader has studied the Zonai
language pretty thoroughly and has an
idea of what it all means.<sp:0:4:0><snd:QuestionNormal_00>According to him, the stone slab in these
ruins is a record of Hyrule during those
ancient days.<sp:0:4:0>It says that some people called "sages"
kept the kingdom safe from some kind
of Demon King.
Talk69:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>When ruins fell from the sky in the
Upheaval, these fell too.

We've only discovered <clr:0000>three <clr:ffff>so far.
We're lucky to have one here.

Aside from this one, we've also confirmed
their presence in <clr:0000>Tarrey Town<clr:ffff> and at<clr:0000>
Digdogg Bridge<clr:ffff>.
Akkala to the northeast, and the Gerudo
region to the southwest...hm. I don't see
a connection.
Because of you, I know that you can get
<clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff> from them, but that's it.<sp:5:0:0>
My report isn't going well at all.
Talk_58:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I suppose you mean that confused-looking
fellow who seems like he needs a nap.
Well, he took off somewhere.
Last I remember, he was complaining that
he didn't like heights.

Try the tent at the big Ring Ruin above
the chief's hall.
Talk_59: <sp:3:0:2:0701>Hm? Where was I?<sp:5:0:0> Ah, the inn owner.
Talk36:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Ease_00>Ahem. If you don't mind, I have research
to do.
Talk01_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>This is Mellie's cherished plum garden.<sp:0:4:0>If anyone but her goes in, the guard
Cuccos attack at once.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>Though I guess that warning comes a
little late now.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>There's also an important experiment in
cultivating sundelions going on here, so
that's an even better reason not to enter.
Balloon02: I don't have time for rain...
Talk52:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>I can't remember exactly what the slab says. <sp:5:0:0>Why
bother when the <clr:0000>translated text<clr:ffff> is right there
next to it?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01>Besides, my hands are full with my sundelion
research. I don't have time to get in the weeds
with sages and Demon Kings and whatnot.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk53:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>Ah, sorry. Just thinking out loud.


Now, please excuse me. I have to hurry
back to my <clr:0000>sundelion<clr:ffff> research.
Balloon04: I need to give this my all!
Talk54: <sp:3:0:2:0701>Um... Ah, that's right. The stone slab.
Item_Plant_R_Kakariko008_Angry:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL>Ah! <sp:5:0:0>Stop!<sp:0:4:0>That sundelion is still being researched.
Please don't let anything happen to it.
Talk09:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>Hm? Yes? What is it?


I need to get back to my <clr:0000>sundelion<clr:ffff>
investigation as soon as possible.

I'm sure travelers will be coming to see
the <clr:0000>stone slab<clr:ffff> soon, and... Oh, I just don't
have time for this.
Talk55:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Thanks to the chief's decision, the
Zonai Survey Team has made a lot
of progress.
Talk20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This area is off-limits. I'm borrowing the
plum garden for my <clr:0000>sundelion <clr:ffff>cultivation.
Talk56:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Ease_00>I still need to look into those strange artifacts
filled with capsules... And I need to tend the
sundelion... Oh, there's never enough time...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Item_Plant_R_Kakariko008_Angry_02: <sp:3:0:2:0a00>Ah! <sp:5:0:0>Seriously, stop that.<sp:0:4:0>That sundelion is a still being researched.
Talk57:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I suppose I should have been paying more
attention, but come now. Sneaking up on
people isn't very nice.
Talk22:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a00>My first priority should be the <clr:0000>sundelion<clr:ffff>. Maybe I'll
see if someone else can look into this artifact...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Item_Plant_R_Kakariko008_Angry_03: <sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b00>Gaaah! Fire! Fire!<sp:0:4:0>I— <sp:5:1:0>I have to put it out!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk58:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_01>What is it?<sp:5:1:0> I need to finish my <clr:0000>sundelion<clr:ffff>
investigation before tourists get word of
the <clr:0000>stone slab<clr:ffff> and tromp all over.
Talk23:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>What is it?


I need to wrap up my report on the
<clr:0000>strange artifacts filled with capsules<clr:ffff>.
No time for idle chatter.
Talk70:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Ease_00>I still need to write up a report about the artifacts
with the Zonai devices inside... And I need to tend
the sundelion... And then...ugh...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk24:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>When ruins fell from the sky in the
Upheaval, these fell too.

We've only discovered <clr:0000>three <clr:ffff>so far.
We're lucky to have one here.

Aside from this one, we've also confirmed
their presence in <clr:0000>Tarrey Town<clr:ffff> and at<clr:0000>
Digdogg Bridge<clr:ffff>.
Akkala to the northeast, and the Gerudo
region in the southwest of Hyrule... Hm,
I don't see a connection.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I don't even know what they were used
for. My report isn't going well at all.
Talk59: <sp:3:0:2:0701>Where was I?<sp:5:1:0> Ah, yes. The ruins.
Talk71:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>Hmm. You can use these <clr:0000>strange artifacts<clr:ffff> to obtain
Zonai devices, but what else? What...else...

I'm too busy with <clr:0000>sundelion <clr:ffff>research to spend time
on this.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Item_Plant_R_Kakariko008_Angry_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL>What are you doing?!


The plum trees are Mellie's treasures.
Please don't play with them.
Talk_61:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice_00>Is that what I think it is?!<sp:0:4:0>So this strange artifact was intended to
produce Zonai devices, huh?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>But why would the Zonai people have
built such a thing?<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000>Hmm.<sp:5:0:0>.<sp:5:0:0>.<sp:5:0:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I couldn't begin to guess.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Item_Plant_R_Kakariko008_Angry_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Excuse me...<sp:5:0:0> Did you hear what I said?


The plum trees have been very well cared
for. Please don't mess with them.
Talk01_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry_00>Didn't you hear me when I said that the
guard Cuccos would attack if you went
into the plum garden?<sp:0:4:0>It's a good thing only I saw you go in.
If Mellie was here, she'd be furious.
So don't do it!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>There's also an important experiment in
cultivating sundelions going on here, so
that's an even better reason not to enter.
Talk44:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad>I found one near this <clr:0000>stone slab<clr:ffff>, so
I'm looking for any seeds that might
have fallen.
Talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think>Maybe there isn't anything here after all.


This is where I found the <clr:0000>sundelion<clr:ffff>, so
there must be seeds or something...

Bah, and I'll bet tourists visiting the stone
slab are going to trample everything soon.
Come on, come on...
Talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Our research did yield an exciting
discovery—<clr:0000>sundelions <clr:ffff>have the potential
to resist <clr:0000>gloom<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Unfortunately, it looks like sundelions
<clr:0000>grow almost exclusively on sky islands<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>They're very rare on the surface, so I'm
running a cultivation experiment.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>Tending this plant is difficult, but it's
worth it when I think about my work
helping poor souls <clr:0000>exposed to gloom<clr:ffff>.
Talk12:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>Hmm... Perhaps something fits into this plate?


<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I... I...<sp:5:1:0> Oh, this doesn't make any sense at all.


How am I supposed to investigate these<clr:0000> strange
artifacts <clr:ffff>when I'm busy with <clr:0000>sundelion <clr:ffff>research?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk47:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you'll excuse me, I have to check on
the <clr:0000>sundelion<clr:ffff>.
Talk61:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're curious about something, ask
around. Everyone on the survey team is
knowledgeable about something.
Talk62:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Honestly, I have my hands full with
<clr:0000>sundelion <clr:ffff>research.

But did that stop me from offering to
research this <clr:0000>strange artifact<clr:ffff>?
Of course not...
Talk63:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Tired_01>Should I consult Tauro? No, no. He's too busy
running the site. 

And neither Ebah nor Saguru <clr:0000>specialize in this<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:1:0> Hm...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk17:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>The sundelion is a <clr:0000>new species of plant<clr:ffff>.
The first one was found on ruins that fell
from the sky.
I believe that means they grow on the
<clr:0000>sky islands<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>I'm still in the middle of my investigation,<sp:5:0:0>
but early results indicate that they have
some sort of relationship with the <clr:0000>gloom<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>If I can prove that, I think they might help
<clr:0000>those suffering from<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>gloom exposure<clr:ffff> or
aid our <clr:0000>research of the<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>Depths<clr:ffff>!
<sp:3:0:2:0701>In any case, it's rare to find them on the
surface, so I'm using the village's <clr:0000>plum
garden<clr:ffff> to see if I can cultivate them.
Talk18:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS>Eh? What? Hm? Did you, erm, hear me?


<sp:3:0:2:0200>I was, um, lying!<sp:5:1:0> So don't tell anyone
what I was saying, OK?
Talk65:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Notice>Hm? Ah, sorry. Are you interested in
these ruins?
Talk19:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Notice>Hm? Ah, sorry. Are you interested in
the <clr:0000>sundelion<clr:ffff>?
PlumGarden_Npc_Umii_Kakariko_Scholar_C_W:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Mellie is in charge of the watering. Let her
handle it, please.
Talk31:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>We call this site the Ring Ruins. These
rings are pieces of the ancient Zonai
civilization—they fell out of the sky.
Inside the broken ruins, we found stone
slabs carved with writing.
Talk66:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Gloom isn't my area of expertise. Luckily,
there's a <clr:0000>specialist<clr:ffff> on the survey team.
I consult him on gloom-related matters.
PlumGarden_Npc_Umii_Kakariko_Scholar_C_W:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Those plants have all the water they need
from the rain.<sp:0:4:0>Mellie's in charge of this garden. Let her
handle it, please.
